main event: A driver spotted a silver, disc-shaped object hovering in front of their car near Castleton, New York on August 5, 1965.
interesting points: The object was shaped like an aircraft wing in a vertical position with a slight indentation in the center.
The object was about the size of a 6-inch pencil held at arm's length.
The object moved from west to east, made a slight turn to the left, and then vanished before reaching a nearby hill.
The object was visible for less than one minute.
The observer, a 43-year-old railroad conductor, considered the report to be of 'fair' reliability.
